title: Mike Pompeo
added: In September 2020, Pompeo accused China of trying to stir up racist unrest in the United States during an address to state lawmakers in Wisconsin.<ref>{{Cite web|title=Pompeo accuses China of fomenting US racial unrest|url=https://www.channelnewsasia.com/news/asia/pompeo-accuses-china-of-fomenting-us-racial-unrest-13140238|access-date=2020-10-08|website=CNA|language=en}}</ref>
